metadata.canonicalQuestion: What factors would make you stay at your current company?
metadata.subQuestion: Pay and compensation (e.g., salary, bonus, stock options)
metadata.userMessage: Year‑on‑year comparisons not available due to methodology changes.

question: Q2 - When considering the below options which are would be most likely to make you stay at your current company?

responses.response: Pay and compensation (e.g., salary, bonus, stock options)
Employee benefits (e.g., healthcare , mental health and wellness services, Paid Time Off, complimentary food and services)
Employer's respect for personal priorities outside of work
Workplace policy (i.e. in office, from home, hybrid)
Social responsibility (e.g., societal justice, community outreach) policies and practices
Use of advanced technologies (e.g., AI, automation)
Visa sponsorship / immigration assistance from an employer
